actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 225 of the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967.

summary.text: Provides, under of the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967, that the authority under such Act of the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries shall extend to the salaries of the Vice President, the Speaker of the House of Representatives, and the Majority and Minority Leaders of the House and Senate.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 225 of the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967.
